dct_description_sm: Map shows regional, electoral district, and town boundaries, three classes of roads and railways. Index to for of electoral districts recommended for each region, city and municipality are indicated in Appendix D of companion volume. Original map is filed in the Map/Geospatial Center, a map reproduction is attached to companion volume. Map should be read in conjunction with the companion report. "Copyright reserved"
